title: JoyMarsha
author: JoyMarsha
created_time: September 27, 2022, 11:16:15 AMLast edit: September 27, 2022, 03:50:33 PM by JoyMarsha
content: Today I look back with not just gladness but hope and enthusiasm because I know that tomorrow will be better.The crypto journey I started a month ago Taking the awareness of crypto and Btt forum to youths has successfully come to an end. My purpose is simply to make humanity and our society better by introducing my peers to crypto and the Btt forum to enable them to have an idea of crypto, develop knowledge in it, and also safeguard their future.The process has not been an easy one. I faced enormous challenges lecturing the youths about crypto. But still, it ended successfully, and I have helped inspire a new generation to learn about how crypto can better their lives.I am constantly on the journey of levelling up in a bid for me to become the best version of myself to help spread the awareness of crypto. Big thanks to Btt forum members for impacting, encouraging and educating me on what to know about how to succeed.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Good idea, it gladdens me seing newbies got motivated from the impact of the forum, not only that but you have also make it a responsibility to take the charge to enlight others about Cryptocurrency, this is a welcome innovation and always remember this that learning never ends and what you've learnt today needed to progress you to a high level of knowledge acquisition, i wish you more better days ahead and a successful crypto experience althrough.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: The vision of this forum to enlighten young people about cryptocurrency is awesome. I would always prefer to invest in new trends than the old ones and looking at newbies researches in cryptocurrency, it really gives me a hope for good future. A lot of youngsters are now aware of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, especially with the widespread media attention received.Anyways, you have started your journey in the crypto world on a very good note and have done a great job to reach this much. Best of luck and i hope that you can make more success in due course of time.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Well done. I understand how exhausting and exhilarating it feels. Your sacrifice in both time and financial resources will not be wasted. In case you are planning to do a another one awareness campaign in the future, may I ask what were your key takeaways and challenges you encountered from this one and how you can make improvements and adjustments in the next one. Your response will benefit those you who would like to replicate this in their locality. Thank you.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: GeorgeJohn on September 27, 2022, 10:33:55 PM~Sometimes it really depends. You do not really need to know everything in Bitcoin. It can be helpful to learn more especially the techy-side, but you're not really "obliged" to learn those. One could be a trader and could have know a little or two about the technical side and surely that would suffice him already since his niche is primarily trading.If you're going for software dev though, well of course you need to learn that.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Perhaps this forum's main reason is to spread information and educate people about crypto, not just to earn money. I see many individuals use this forum as their basis or sources in teaching their friends and in school knowing that not all information can be found on the internet outside BTT. I know OP you're not obliged to do this but you volunteer to do this for the sake of helping others who are also entitled to at least aware of the situation and also to avoid from many scams that popups on social media enticing us and offering money.
